content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Farhad Abbasi from Iran.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price of the apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, what was the sticking point in the negotiation?
name: Evaluator

content: The sticking point in the negotiation was that as a greedy landlord, I always wanted more money for my apartment. I was not satisfied with the potential tenant's offers, which started at 300 Euro per month and ended at 500 Euro per month. I was always asking him to make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I am not satisfied with the outcome. As a greedy landlord, I always want the highest price possible. The negotiation ended with the potential tenant offering 500 Euro per month, which is not at the level I was hoping for.
name: Peter Schmidt
